column2: Dicedots is looking for Procurement Specialist to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     As a Procurement Specialist, your role is to oversee the purchasing process for goods and services required by an organization    You will be responsible for identifying suppliers, negotiating contracts, and ensuring timely delivery of quality products and services    Your primary goal is to optimize procurement activities and contribute to the overall efficiency and cost-effectiveness of the organization     Key Responsibilities:     Supplier Management:Identify, evaluate, and select suppliers based on quality, cost, reliability, and delivery requirements    Develop and maintain strong relationships with suppliers to ensure favorable terms, negotiate contracts, and resolve issues    Monitor supplier performance and conduct periodic evaluations to ensure compliance with contractual agreements and quality standards    Sourcing and Procurement:Conduct market research and analysis to identify potential vendors and assess market trends, pricing, and availability of goods and services    Collaborate with internal stakeholders to define procurement requirements, specifications, and budgets    Prepare and issue requests for proposals (RFPs), requests for quotations (RFQs), and requests for information (RFIs) to solicit competitive bids    Evaluate vendor proposals and negotiate terms and conditions to achieve the best value for the organization    Generate purchase orders, review purchase requisitions, and ensure compliance with organizational policies and procedures    Manage the procurement process from order placement to delivery, ensuring timely and accurate fulfillment of orders    Coordinate with receiving and accounts payable departments to resolve any discrepancies or issues related to purchased items    Contract Management:Develop and maintain contracts with suppliers, including terms and conditions, pricing, delivery schedules, and service level agreements    Review and negotiate contract amendments, extensions, and renewals as necessary    Ensure compliance with contract terms, legal requirements, and ethical standards    Continuous Improvement:Identify opportunities for cost savings, process improvements, and supplier performance enhancements    Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and new technologies in procurement and supply chain management    Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement process improvements and contribute to overall organizational efficiency
column13: Procurement, Purchase, Purchase management, Management, Cost

column2: ?   OVERVIEW:   Are you an aspiring senior software engineering manager looking for an opportunity to work in a fast paced and fun environmentThen consider joining us here at Skillsoft in Hyderabad. We are building our next generation SaaS platform with a goal of being the best in the industry . Our platform lets our 6000+ customers consume content from a variety of sources with a strong focus on video, from any device, with features that fit the needs of learner. We believe that our customers deserve the best platform and we are delivering on those needs with the platform you will be working on. You could be the one to help us achieve this goal!   The senior software engineering manager is a technical leadership role on the Skillsoft engineering team. Our engineering team is growing, and we re looking for great leaders who can help us attract, mentor and retain more great engineers. We believe that exceptional employees are the key to our success and are looking for a senior manager who can coach these employees and help align their goals with organizational needs while building great software products. This role will lead squads which will be responsible for integrating out leaner experience system with rest of the LMS s and also aggregate content from other platforms to our Learner experience portal.   OPPORTUNITY HIGHLIGHTS:    Coaching, mentoring and recruiting engineers that know what great software looks like, and want to create it.     Facilitating continuous learning for yourself and your team     Driving continuous improvement and technical excellence     Helps the team adapt and improve SAFe practices     Mentor engineering teams through formal and informal discussions, design reviews, technical presentations, peer code reviews, etc.     Establish credibility with brilliant engineers quickly     Hands-on design and code implementation.    SKILLS QUALIFICATIONS:    16+ years of strong software engineering background working with cloud based enterprise solutions     5+ years of experience as a manager     Have demonstrated experience managing technical teams, setting goals and crafting plans to achieve them     Experience leading high performing teams with local and remote members     Very strong experience leading team in Agile culture and preferably SAFe     Proficient at building engineering teams that ship with predictability and high quality     Very strong and hands-on experience with open source tools and technologies such as node.js, react.js, Postgres, Kafka Cassandra.     Strong understanding with technical integration technologies such as API operations and XML and JSON concepts, as well as other web and database technology     Experience in continuous integration / continuous deployment processes     Experience building java based public/private cloud solutions for large-scale enterprises     Experience working with DevOps and experience with containerization and AWS to support internal engineering activities is a plus    Education and Certifications    Bachelors / Masters in Computer Science Preferred

column2: OVERVIEW:   The Senior Solution Architect is an integral member of the Skillsoft s sales organization. The Senior Solution Architect is responsible for supporting the sales cycle of new business and key renewal opportunities by strategizing with the Account Executive (AE) sales strategy and product fit that best support customer business learning needs, and in collaboration with sales, you will drive revenue growth across a broad set of customers. They will be configuring and performing product demonstrations, manage pilots, develop POC solutions that best suit customer needs, setting appropriate expectations during the sales cycle, and supporting other processes in the sales cycle as appropriate. The Senior Solution Architect role also serves as a mentor and SA lead representative for the region they support. Superior knowledge in all Skillsoft s customer lifecycle and in all the Learning solutions Products.    OPPORTUNITY HIGHLIGHTS:    Provide pre-sales support by articulating the value of Skillsoft, executing, and designing engaging demos, evaluations and pilot requests.     Research and understand the prospect s business to better consult with sales team on sales strategy and presentation.     Serve as deal captain for SA-driven opportunities to ensure demo plan processes are followed and key resources (PSAs, Principals, Product) are included as appropriate.     Lead Structured Pilots including site builds, site configuration, kick-off, marketing, monitoring and results.     Support AEs throughout RFI/RFP process including RFP strategy, review of RFP team s response, follow-up questions, preparing and delivering customer presentation as appropriate.     Conduct regular prospect planning sessions with AEs to identify ways to support the progression of the sales cycle for key opportunities.     Support assigned regions in quarterly initiatives to help drive forecast pipeline such as creating email templates, customized sites, processing registrations, running reports, etc.     Describe and discuss the Strategic Implementation process (direct Percipio, TPLMS, or Compliance Platform) and requirements with sales prospects.     Maintain knowledge of how Skillsoft content can integrate into third-party LMSs and talent systems. This includes being able to discuss and demonstrate the user experience and best practices for viewing Skillsoft content in third-party systems.     Maintain and utilize competitive knowledge to set traps in demonstrations, evaluations and during the RFP process.     Have Sold or supported enterprise software solutions to IT, Learning and Development, and tech leader decision makers     Possess a conversational level of technical knowledge around key business and emerging technologies (AWS, Azure, Microsoft, AI, Cybersecurity, etc) in order to confidently speak to Tech and Dev customers looking to purchase content solutions to meet their business needs.     Maintain industry knowledge and trends relating to implementation,(e)learning technologies, end-user and LMS technologies.     Maintain knowledge and skills, through ongoing training in Skillsoft product areas including platform and content.     Maintain knowledge of Skillsoft s Solution Services, Platform Services and Custom Content Development     Contribute to the ongoing improvement of process efficiencies     Coach individual contributor Solution Architects on presenting effective custom demonstrations and pre-sales process best practices.     Represent the SA organization in the regional and provide insight into business sales strategy to help drive SA processes/strategies and provide updates as necessary.     Partner with sales leaders to better understand the marketplace, strategize and identify areas for SA support.     Enter key prospect activities and opportunity progress in Skillsoft s CRM.    SKILLS QUALIFICATIONS:    7+ years of experience in a Pre-sales or Solutions Consultant role in the eLearning/LMS industry     Field based employee with 35-40% travel     Sales Consultancy Skills - incorporates selling mindset into consultative approach in order to achieve goals.     Experience in presales and working with large and complex customer environment     Presentation skills with a high degree of comfort speaking in large or small groups with executives, IT Management, stakeholders     Strong demonstration skills that leverage     Knowledge of the HR, learning development market particularly in the region     Excellent communication skills with an ability to right level conversations     Ability to conduct demonstrations of Skillsoft s offering, both in a virtual or face-to-face situation, by leveraging listening, questioning, and storytelling skills; ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical audiences      Proactively identifies programs and uses logic, data and sound judgement to recommend solutions.    Education And Certifications    Bachelor s Degree in business, education or related field; or equivalent experience

column2: About The RoleThe Administrative Coordinator will play a pivotal role in ensuring operational efficiency within our organization. As an Administrative Coordinator, you will be responsible for coordinating shipping logistics, managing travel arrangements, organizing events, overseeing tools and software access, addressing queries from key stakeholders, preparing expense reports, handling office supplies, systematically filing documents, and collaborating with the Accounts team on accounting. Your contribution will be essential in maintaining seamless administrative processes and supporting overall organizational productivity.What Describes You Best* Bachelors of Commerce or equivalent (Strong background in Accounting)* 1.5-3 years of experience in Office administration with involvement in Accounts* Prior experience in Tech Company preferredSkills* Excellent networking and resource mobilization skills* Excellent Communication and Coordination skills* Good organizational and time management skills* Good negotiation skills* Basic understanding of Excel* Basic understanding of Banking and accounting* Good Problem-solving skillsAdditional note : Must be open to travel/commute as necessaryWhat will you OwnThe Administrative Coordinator will take the ownership of smooth operations by executing on required shipping, travel, events, stakeholder queries, expenses, supplies, documents, banking, software and device issues, and collaborating with the Accounts department.How will you spend your time at Eclat* Providing Financial and Administrative Support: Managing expense reports, payroll management, handling bank-related tasks, employee entry-exit formalities, overseeing office supplies, and providing general administrative support.* Handling Communication and Access Control: Managing operational communication, answering calls and emails on operations related queries, while also managing access control to tools and software.* Vendor Management* Coordinating Shipping and Logistics: Overseeing shipping processes for devices, onboarding kits, prizes, certificatesand gifts.* Managing Travel and Events: Arranging travel plans, accommodations, and scheduling in-house and external events.* Continuously Improving Processes: Identifying opportunities for process enhancement, contributing to overall administrative efficiency.Why Join Us* Be a part of our growth story as we aim to take leadership position in international markets * Opportunity to manage and lead global teams and channel partner network* Join technology innovators who believe in solving world-scale challenges to drive global knowledge-sharing* Healthy work/life balance offering wellbeing initiatives, parental leave, career development assistance, required work infrastructure support

column2: Company Address:  Plot Number: 39/A Dr.Subba Rao Colony, Picket, Secunderabad, Telangana 500026,  Job Description:As a Finance Executive, your primary responsibility will be to ensure the accurate and up-to-date maintenance of the company's financial records. This role requires meticulous attention to detail and the ability to record daily financial transactions promptly and accurately. You will be an integral part of the finance team, contributing to the smooth operation of financial processes within the organization.Roles and Responsibilities:Recording Transactions: Accurately record various types of financial transactions on a daily basis, including purchase entries, journal entries, contra entries, and receipt entries.Accounts Payable Management: Update and maintain accounts payable, ensuring timely and accurate payment processing. Conduct regular reconciliation of accounts to verify their accuracy.Accounts Receivable: Manage accounts receivable by issuing invoices to clients and tracking outstanding payments. Follow up on overdue payments and communicate with clients regarding payment status.Financial Reporting: Assist in the preparation of financial reports and statements, providing relevant data and analysis as required. Collaborate with the finance team to ensure timely and accurate financial reporting.Advanced Excel Proficiency: Demonstrate a high level of proficiency in Advanced Excel functions, including VLOOKUP and HLOOKUP for efficient data retrieval. Utilize SUMIF, COUNTIF, and Pivot tables for data analysis and reporting purposes.Compliance and Audit Support: Support the finance team in adhering to financial regulations and company policies. Assist with internal and external audits as necessary.Financial Analysis: Conduct basic financial analysis to identify trends, discrepancies, and opportunities for improvement. Present findings to senior finance personnel for decision-making purposes.Process Improvement: Identify areas for process improvement within the finance department and suggest solutions to enhance efficiency and accuracy.Required Skills and Experience:Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field.Proven experience in finance or accounting roles, with a strong track record of maintaining accurate financial records.Proficiency in Advanced Excel, including VLOOKUP, HLOOKUP, SUMIF, COUNTIF, and Pivot tables.Familiarity with financial regulations and compliance requirements.Excellent analytical skills and attention to detail.Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.Ability to work independently and as part of a team, managing priorities effectively.Integrity and ethical behavior in handling financial information.

column2: Job descriptionAbout UsEstablished in 2017, iGuru specialises in educational technology. Our flagship products are iGuru School Management Software, which simplifies and streamlines school administration, and iGuruPrep, a tailored learning system for students in grades 6-12 preparing for competitive exams.We are currently seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented individual to fill the role of an Accounts Manager at our dynamic startup. This is not just any job; it is a pathway to becoming a key player in our company's future. If you excel in a fast-paced environment, have a proactive "Get Things Done" mindset, and are eager to make a significant contribution to our financial operations, then you are the ideal candidate for this position.In this role, you will have the chance to dive deep into the financial workings of a startup.Job ResponsibilitiesAs a Senior Accounts Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the financial transactions of the company, ensuring accuracy and compliance with legal standards. Your key responsibilities will includeManaging daily financial transactions, including ledger maintenance, bank reconciliations, and processing payments.Overseeing the client collection mechanism to ensure timely receivables.Handling employee salary processing and related financial matters.Compiling and analysing financial statements to provide accurate financial reporting.Leading budgeting and forecasting efforts, providing strategic insights to support business decisions.Maintaining cash books, ledgers, and conducting Tally data entry for sales, purchases, receipts, and payments.Ensuring timely bank reconciliation statements and preparation of debtors/creditors statements.Taking full ownership of accounting processes and ensuring the integrity of financial data.Facilitating audits by providing necessary documentation and explanations as required.Staying abreast of changes in accounting regulations and ensuring compliance with statutory requirements.Preparing GST reconciliation, cash projection reconciliation, and prepaid expense reconciliation reports.Qualifications and ExperienceProven experience with Tally ERP.In-depth knowledge of GST computations, ESI, and EPF.Proficient in Hindi and English.Bachelors degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.A minimum of 3 years of experience in an accounting role, preferably in a senior capacity.Strong understanding of accounting principles and financial standards.Exceptional analytical skills with an attention to detail.Excellent organisational and time management skills.Ability to work independently and as part of a team.Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.BenefitsEmployee first cultureCompetitive salary: iGuru offers a competitive salary package that reflects the candidate's skills, experience, and qualifications.Health insurance: The candidate will be eligible for health insurance coverage.Professional development: iGuru is committed to helping its employees grow and develop professionally.Collaborative work environment: iGuru promotes a collaborative work environment where employees are encouraged to share ideas, work together, and support each other.Ready to shape the future of education tech? iGuru is your stage!Strictly for Hyderabad Residents since 15 to 20 yearsAnnual CTC provided 3.6 to 4.5 lpaEnglish , Hindi and Telugu is a mustSend your resume to careers@iguru.guru/ watsapp on 9381760264 and join a mission that matters. Dare to make a difference!

column2: ?   Are you an aspiring Software engineering manager looking for an opportunity to work in a fast paced and fun environmentThen consider joining us here at Skillsoft in Hyderabad. You will be part of the team that develops Percipio Industry leading and our next generation SaaS platform with a goal of being the best in the industry . Our platform lets our 6000+ customers consume content from a variety of sources with a strong focus on video, from any device, with features that fit the needs of learner.   The software engineering manager is a technical leadership role on the Skillsoft engineering team. Our engineering team is growing, and we re looking for great leaders who can help us attract, mentor and retain smart engineers. We believe that exceptional employees are the key to our success and are looking for strong technical leader who can coach these employees and help align their goals with organizational needs while building great software products. This role will lead squads which will be responsible for developing leaner experience system with great passion towards building best of the breed user experience.   OPPORTUNITY HIGHLIGHTS:    Hands-on design and code implementation     Coaching, mentoring and recruiting engineers that know what great software looks like, and want to create it     Facilitating continuous learning for yourself and your team     Driving continuous improvement and technical excellence     Helps the team adapt and improve SAFe practices     Mentor engineering teams through formal and informal discussions, design reviews, technical presentations, peer code reviews, etc.     Establish credibility with brilliant engineers quickly    SKILLS QUALIFICATIONS:    14+ years of strong software engineering background working with cloud-based enterprise solutions     2+ years of experience as a manager     in-depth experience with ReactJS, Redux, GraphQL, CSS, HTML, JavaScript and modern front end frameworks like React     Very strong and hands-on experience with open-source tools and technologies such as node.js, react.js, Postgres, Kafka Cassandra     Strong understanding with technical integration technologies such as API operations and XML and JSON concepts, as well as other web and database technologies     Have demonstrated experience managing technical teams, setting goals and crafting plans to achieve them     Experience leading high performing teams with local and remote members     Very strong experience leading team in Agile culture and preferably SAFe     Proficient at building engineering teams that ship with predictability and high quality     Experience in continuous integration / continuous deployment processes     Experience building AWS based public cloud solutions for large-scale enterprises     Experience working with DevOps and experience with containerization and AWS to support internal engineering activities is a plus

column2: OVERVIEW     As Revenue Accountant , you will drive efficiencies in systems and processes and support revenue recognition for Skillsoft s worldwide business units.    This position will be a critical member of the accounting team and will be instrumental in ensuring the proper accounting of routine and non-routine transactions.    This opportunity is right for a highly motivated self-starter to contribute as a key member of the corporate revenue team.      OPPORTUNITY HIGHLIGHTS     Review of sales arrangements identifying Skillsoft s performance obligations and associated fees in accordance with ASC 606.   Participate in process improvement projects in collaboration with cross functional teams.    Assist in maintaining internal control policy and procedure documentation in accordance with SOX standards. This individual is also expected to assist in evaluation and test annual SOX compliance.    Work closely with both the Legal department and Sales team to structure customer deals while ensuring favorable business terms that are in-line with the Company s revenue recognition model.    Determine and analyze costs attributable to recorded revenue.    Regularly meet and build relationships with functional owners to create metrics, review performance and address business needs.    Prepare revenue recognition analysis in line with the new 606 guidance as well as revenue and deferred revenue account reconciliations.    Assist in all revenue recognition matters with the external audit firm for quarterly reviews and annual audits.    Provide timely and comprehensive responses to inquiries from various department heads and functional owners (Sales, Finance, Marketing, etc.) as they relate to sales arrangements.    Assist in the preparation of revenue reports for the company s Senior Management Team and Board of Directors.    Create ad-hoc reports, analyses and metrics as requested by members of the Finance Accounting team, Sales Marketing.    Create and maintain databases necessary to support reporting requirements.      SKILLS QUALIFICATIONS     Bachelor s degree in Finance or Accounting    Experience in a similar capacity with a CPA and/or industry experience.    Experience working with a SaaS and/or Software Company.    Extensive knowledge of GAAP and software revenue recognition rules including ASC 606.    Proven ability to initiate process change resulting in efficiencies.    Proven ability to work cross-functionally and working in a matrixed organization.    Ability to work independently with high attention to detail and strong problem-solving skills while completing tasks on a timely basis.    Excel skills at a high level. Experience working with business systems. Experience working with Sales Force Dot Com (SFDC) a plus.    Ability to manage multiple projects at the same time, with changing and sometimes competing priorities, and still meet deadlines.    Strong verbal and written communication, presentation skills and relationship management.
